00053 class AUDACITY_DLL_API EffectNyquist:public Effect
00054 {
00055  public:
00056    
00060    EffectNyquist(wxString fName);
00061    virtual ~EffectNyquist();
00062 
00063    bool SetXlispPath();
00064 
00065    bool LoadedNyFile() {
00066       return mOK;
00067    }
00068 
00069    void Continue();
00070    void Break();
00071    void Stop();
00072 
00073    void SetCommand(wxString cmd);
00074    wxString GetOutput();
00075 
00080    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00081       return mName;
00082    }
00083    
00084    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00085       std::set<wxString> cats;
00086       for (size_t i = 0; i < mCategories.GetCount(); i++) {
00087          cats.insert(mCategories[i]);
00088       }
00089       return cats;
00090    }
00091 
00092    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00093       if (mInteractive) {
00094          // Disabled for now...
00095          return wxT("");
00096       }
00097       
00098       wxStringTokenizer st(mName, wxT(" "));
00099       wxString id;
00100 
00101       // CamelCase the name
00102       while (st.HasMoreTokens()) {
00103          wxString tok = st.GetNextToken();
00104 
00105          id += tok.Left(1).MakeUpper() + tok.Mid(1);
00106       }
00107 
00108       return id;
00109    }
00110    
00111    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00112       return mAction;
00113    }
00114    
00115    virtual bool PromptUser();
00116    
00117    virtual bool Process();
00118 
00119  private:
00120 
00121    bool ProcessOne();
00122 
00123    static int StaticGetCallback(float *buffer, int channel,
00124                                 long start, long len, long totlen,
00125                                 void *userdata);
00126    static int StaticPutCallback(float *buffer, int channel,
00127                                 long start, long len, long totlen,
00128                                 void *userdata);
00129    static void StaticOutputCallback(int c, void *userdata);
